results.deck: Samurai Warriors' first expansion pack release uses Samurai Warriors 4-II as a base and adds many more features, including an option for characters to wed.
results.name: Sengoku Musou 4 Empires

results.deck: The next game in the Skylanders franchises adds air, sea, and land vehicles to the mix.
results.name: Skylanders SuperChargers

results.deck: The seventeenth installment in 2K's basketball franchise features a career mode written and directed by Spike Lee.
results.name: NBA 2K16

results.deck: An upcoming entry in the long-running Tales action-RPG series, following the exploits of a pirate named Velvet.
results.name: Tales of Berseria

results.deck: The 2015 edition of the offical Tour de France video game franchise.
results.name: Le Tour de France 2015

results.deck: Barbie and Her Sisters Rescue Puppies.
results.name: Barbie & Her Sisters: Puppy Rescue

results.deck: Based on the classic 80s version of the Transformers animated series, Transformers: Devastation by PlatinumGames is a brawler with an authentic retro-themed art style.
results.name: Transformers: Devastation

results.deck: An entry in the Just Dance series which introduces smartphone interaction and Just Dance Unlimited, a streaming service.
results.name: Just Dance 2016

results.deck: The seventeenth entry in the Atelier series of RPGs by Gust.
results.name: Atelier Sophie: The Alchemist of the Mysterious Book

results.deck: A second 2D fighting game in the Koihime Musou series.
results.name: Koihime Enbu

results.deck: The 2015 edition of 2K and Yuke's WWE 2K franchise.
results.name: WWE 2K16

results.deck: A spin-off from the long-running JRPG series, Builders tasks the player with rebuilding the ruined world of Alfegard... using some very familiar looking square blocks.
results.name: Dragon Quest Builders

results.deck: The latest addition to the Arc System Works anime fighting game franchise, BlazBlue. Featuring new characters, new story, and a couple new game mechanics.
results.name: BlazBlue: Central Fiction

results.deck: An HD remake of the PS2 game Odin Sphere, with reworked gameplay and additional content.
results.name: Odin Sphere Leifthrasir

results.deck: The World Rally Championship license moves to new developer Kylotonn Games for the 2015 season.
results.name: WRC 5

results.deck: BigBen and HB Studios adds the official Rugby World Cup license to their 2015 Rugby game.
results.name: Rugby World Cup 2015

results.deck: The first revision in the Guilty Gear Xrd series.
results.name: Guilty Gear Xrd -Revelator-

results.deck: Originally released as a PlayStation exclusive Koei-Tecmo/Omega Force Attack on Titan game (PS3, PS4 and Vita), this game will also release on Steam and Xbox One outside of Japan. It features a focus on quick action and item management like other games based on the franchise while exploring the story of the 2013 anime.
results.name: Attack on Titan

results.deck: The Battride War series begins pulling its roster from earlier incarnations of the tokusatsu heroes.
results.name: Kamen Rider: Battride War Genesis

results.deck: An HD remake of the original Ryu ga Gotoku (Yakuza) game, for PlayStation 4.
results.name: Ryu ga Gotoku Kiwami
Monster High: New Ghoul in School

results.deck: The 2016 edition of the Powerful Pro Yakyuu series.
results.name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2016

results.deck: Jackbox Games returns with five more comedic party games.
results.name: The Jackbox Party Pack 2

results.deck: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition adds additional characters, balance changes, and more.
results.name: Dengeki Bunko: Fighting Climax Ignition

results.deck: Koei Tecmo's mythical Japan flavored demon hunting game gets its first fully fledged sequel.
results.name: Toukiden 2

results.deck: The 2016 edition of Koei Tecmo's long running horse racing sim.
results.name: Winning Post 8 2016

results.deck: The third and final chapter in the Utawarerumono series
results.name: Utawarerumono: Futari no Hakuoro

results.deck: A Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles game from PlatinumGames and Activision, based on IDW's comic book version of the mutants.
results.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Mutants in Manhattan

results.deck: Sony's long-running baseball franchise returns for the 2016 season.
results.name: MLB The Show 16

results.deck: A new PlayStation 3 and PlayStation 4 entry into the longrunning Sengoku Basara series which follows the life of Sanada Yukimura
results.name: Sengoku Basara: Sanada Yukimura-Den

results.deck: The latest entry in the longrunning series of Gundam strategy RPG's, SD Gundam G Generation Genesis is being developed to launch on PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4 and PlayStation Vita in 2016 as part of Gundam's 30th Anniversary
results.name: SD Gundam G Generation Genesis

results.deck: A Japan only entry into the Winning Post series developed by Koei in 2009
results.name: Winning Post World

results.deck: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens covers the seventh film and includes material that occurred between Return of the Jedi and Force Awakens.
results.name: LEGO Star Wars: The Force Awakens

results.deck: The third in Tru Blu's series of rugby games.
results.name: Rugby Challenge 3

results.deck: An "Original Generation" entry of the Super Robot Taisen series for PlayStation 3 and 4.
results.name: Super Robot Taisen OG: The Moon Dwellers

results.deck: A sequel to the 2014 reboot of the Hayarigami horror visual novel franchise.
results.name: Shin Hayarigami 2

results.deck: A strategy RPG focusing on Zhao Yun, taking place in a parallel world
results.name: Sangoku Musou: Eiketsuden

results.deck: 2017 brings another Madden game to the table.
results.name: Madden NFL 17

results.deck: Players are given the opportunity to create their own characters in Skylanders Imaginators.
results.name: Skylanders Imaginators

results.deck: EA's association football game for 2016 runs on the Frostbite engine.
results.name: FIFA 17

results.deck: Konami's long-running soccer franchise returns for a 2016 release. It uses the Fox Engine and introduces a new mechanic called Real Touch.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2017

results.deck: A "Warriors" game based on the manga Berserk.
results.name: Berserk Musou

results.deck: Just Dance 2017 is to be available for all modern major consoles as well as a few legacy platforms.
results.name: Just Dance 2017
